channel.title: Simple, But Need Help

item.title: Simple, But Need Help
item.dc:creator: @lov3_rs_money lov3_rs_money
item.description:
@lov3_rs_money wrote:

[quote=“n0va k0, post:2, topic:195184”]SummonNewNPC(####);

Have to declare this,

public void SummonNewNPC(int npcID) { server.npcHandler.newSummonedNPC(npcID, absX, absY-1, heightLevel, absX-1, absY-1, absX+1, absY-1, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(npcID), false, playerId); summonedNPCS++; actionTimer = 20; }[/quote]
Ok, Thanks M8
Rep++
~Lov3_rs_money

Read full topic

item.title: Simple, But Need Help
item.dc:creator: @lov3_rs_money lov3_rs_money
item.description:
@lov3_rs_money wrote:

Hello,
I Was Wondering How To Add A Npc When Somebody Opens A Box With Key.

				else if(useItemID == 4446 && atObjectID == 6420) 
				{
				sendMessage("Your On Your Last Part! Good Luck!");
				deleteItem(2887,getItemSlot(2887), 1);
}

How Would I Add When They Open The Box, It Spawns An Npc?
Thank You!
~Lov3_rs_money
I Will Rep++ Whoever Helps.
